R0052.title: Low Price, High Shipping
R0052.definition: A seller lists products at a relatively low price but compensates for the cost gap by inflating shipping fees.
R0052.description: This strategy may make products appear competitively priced to attract shoppers, but the seller actually earns more profit through excessive shipping charges.
R0052.influence: Shoppers may purchase items without noticing the high shipping fees, leading to a poor experience; for the platform, inflated shipping fees from sellers may damage the platform's reputation.

references.title: Items priced 30 yuan or below must include free shipping; WeChat Channels cracks down on 'low price, high shipping'
